text: Beryozovka () is a rural locality (a village) in Zubovsky Selsoviet, Ufimsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 115 as of 2010. There is 1 street. == Geography == It is located 20 km from Ufa, 6 km from Zubovo. == References == Category:Rural localities in Ufimsky District
title: Beryozovka, Ufimsky District, Republic of Bashkortostan
